mutants.code:
def select_best_movie(T, n, L, R):
    results = []
    for t in range(T):
        current_n = n[t]
        current_L = L[t]
        current_R = R[t]
        products = [current_L[i] * current_R[i] for i in range(current_n)]
        max_product = max(products)
        max_product_indices = [i for i in range(current_n) if products[i] == max_product]
        max_rating_indices = [i for i in max_product_indices if current_R[i] == max((current_R[j] for j in max_product_indices))]
        best_movie_index = min(max_rating_indices) - 1
        results.append(best_movie_index)
    return results

def select_best_movie(T, n, L, R):
    results = []
    for t in range(T):
        current_n = n[t]
        current_L = L[t]
        current_R = R[t]
        products = [current_L[i] * current_R[i] for i in range(current_n)]
        max_product = max(products)
        max_product_indices = [i for i in range(current_n) if products[i] == max_product]
        max_rating_indices = [i for i in max_product_indices if current_R[i] == max((current_R[j] for j in max_product_indices))]
        best_movie_index = min(max_rating_indices) * 1
        results.append(best_movie_index)
    return results

def select_best_movie(T, n, L, R):
    results = []
    for t in range(T):
        current_n = n[t]
        current_L = L[t]
        current_R = R[t]
        products = [current_L[i] * current_R[i] for i in range(current_n)]
        max_product = max(products)
        max_product_indices = [i for i in range(current_n) if products[i] != max_product]
        max_rating_indices = [i for i in max_product_indices if current_R[i] == max((current_R[j] for j in max_product_indices))]
        best_movie_index = min(max_rating_indices) + 1
        results.append(best_movie_index)
    return results

mutants.original_line: max_rating_indices = [i for i in max_product_indices if current_R[i] == max(current_R[j] for j in max_product_indices)]

def select_best_movie(T, n, L, R):
    results = []
    for t in range(T):
        current_n = n[t]
        current_L = L[t]
        current_R = R[t]
        products = [current_L[i] * current_R[i] for i in range(current_n)]
        max_product = max(products)
        max_product_indices = [i for i in range(current_n) if products[i] == max_product]
        max_rating_indices = [i for i in max_product_indices if current_R[i] != max((current_R[j] for j in max_product_indices))]
        best_movie_index = min(max_rating_indices) + 1
        results.append(best_movie_index)
    return results
